pli-tv-bi-vb-pc37:1.3: “Raped” renders dūsenti. For a discussion of this word, see Appendix I: Technical Terms.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc37:2.1.14: For a discussion of the rendering “inhabited area” for gāma, see Appendix I: Technical Terms.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc37:2.1.15: “Six kilometers” renders addhayojana, “half a yojana”. For further discussion of the yojana, see sugata in Appendix I: Technical Terms.
